io.javadog.cws.api.requests

Class Authentication

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.javadog.cws.api.requests.Verifiable
      • io.javadog.cws.api.requests.Authentication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FetchCircleRequest, FetchDataRequest, FetchDataTypeRequest, FetchMemberRequest, FetchSignatureRequest, ProcessCircleRequest, ProcessDataRequest, ProcessDataTypeRequest, ProcessMemberRequest, SettingRequest, SignRequest, VerifyRequest

    public class Authentication
extends Verifiable

    Base Authentication Object for all incoming Requests. It contains the name of the Account, plus the credentials to unlock the Account. Both the name and credentials is mandatory, whereas the type of credential is optional with a fallback to PassPhrase.

    Since:
    CWS 1.0
    Author:
    Kim Jensen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
